title: Integrated Problem-Based Learning (PBL) Curriculum in Dentistry

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Dental Science Knowledge (Anatomy, Pathology, etc.) and Fundamental Clinical Techniques
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment aimed at strengthening vertical/horizontal integrated education and patient-centered clinical competencies, combining digital learning materials with real clinical case simulations

learning_goals: Participants can analyze real dental patient cases and apply dental caries diagnostic protocols.
Based on diagnostic results, participants can design and explain personalized preventive programs.
Participants can integrate foundational dental knowledge and clinical skills to propose patient management strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
